data.eml:eml: Two new species of Bahita Oman, 1938 from Central-Western Brazil (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Camisão, Beatriz M., Takiya, Daniela M. (2017): Two new species of Bahita Oman, 1938 from Central-Western Brazil (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae). Zootaxa 4281 (1): 198-206, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4281.1.18
